item.title: Our Difference
item.description: Data company which helps their clients on their storage for on premises applications and servers into cloud environments. We also provide guidance and best practices to optimize existing data pipelines but also provides guidance while architect and designing new data ingestion patterns. We have more than a decade on developing and optimizing Database applications on Enterprise level on different domains.

item.title: Data Warehouse Design: The good, the bad, the ugly
item.description: One of the significant challenges in handling data comes from the massive amount of data your organization is most likely generating constantly. Having the ability to react quickly and accurately turns into a differential item among competitors. More and more companies are becoming aware of the need to handle data wisely. They’re looking for ways of getting the most out of their information. And this is probably where they first hear about data warehouses.
